plot: A troubled amateur archaeologist begins a journey of self-discovery, digging up more than he bargained for whilst excavating the grounds of his late parents' house.
title: Archæology
plot_es: A troubled amateur archaeologist begins a journey of self-discovery, digging up more than he bargained for whilst excavating the grounds of his late parents' house.
plot_en: A troubled amateur archaeologist begins a journey of self-discovery, digging up more than he bargained for whilst excavating the grounds of his late parents' house.
